content: Bank Account Asked by Shiqi ChenAsked on 27 Dec 2018Is there an issue with the syncing of DBS on the Seedly App on Android after activating the DBS Digital Token?I keep getting this error "Provider unavailable, try again later.(vyz35)" and do not receive any notifications from my DBS mobile banking app.2 answersAnswerBump1
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Jerry TanLevel 2. RookieAnswered on 03 Jan 2019I was having the same problem of not receiving notifications from my DBS mobile banking app. What I did was to turn off notifications and turn it back on again. When I tried syncing again, it worked! IDK how but it happened haha. To turn on/off notifications for the DBS app: For iOS devices
Access Settings → Select Notifcations → Select the DBS/POSB digibank app or DBS iWealth app → Turn on Notifications
For Android devices
Access Settings → Select Apps & notifications → Select Notifications → Select App notifications → Select the DBS/POSB digibank app or DBS iWealth app → Turn on Notifications 0 comments1

Gabriel LeeLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 28 Dec 2018Just tried and it works fine on my Samsung Galaxy S9! Maybe check out the post below to see if you did it correctlyhttps://www.facebook.com/460639650790741/posts/1014141025440598/0 comments0
